Action adventure sequel, starring Sam Neill, William H Macy, Tea Leoni and Alessandro Nivola(n)

programme.title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left in the temporary care of a friend when their owners are forced to move away. Thinking they have been abandoned, the trio hit the road in a bid to find their way home. Adventure, featuring the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Don Ameche. Kim Greist, Robert Hays and Benj Thall take the human roles(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A disillusioned man learns his father was a member of a secret society of superpowered assassins dedicated to eliminating people who are destined to commit acts of evil in the future. Having inherited his father's special abilities, he is recruited into the organisation and must take on a former member who has betrayed it. Action adventure, starring James McAvoy, Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: Careful What You Wish For
programme.desc: A teenager gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker, as a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal. Thriller, starring Nick Jonas, Dermot Mulroney and Isabel Lucas

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol agent and a district attorney discover a major international bank is involved in a vast range of illegal activities, from insider trading to arms deals and bringing down governments. As they battle to expose the truth, they find the corrupt organisation not only has the law on its side, but will kill to keep the secrets safe. Thriller, starring Clive Owen and Naomi Watts

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent is assigned to protect a witness in the trial of a feared crime boss. However, when they board their flight from Hawaii to Los Angeles, the gangster's henchmen set in motion their plan to smuggle onto the aircraft and then release 450 poisonous snakes. Thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Julianna Margulies and Jonathan Phillips

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: A cop returns to duty after being injured in an incident that led to the death of his partner. On his first day back, he discovers evidence of corruption among his colleagues. He soon finds himself trapped inside his own precinct and fighting for survival against crooked cops determined to keep their misdeeds a secret. Action thriller sequel, starring Jonathan Good and Roger R Cross

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: An Interpol agent and a district attorney discover a major international bank is involved in a vast range of illegal activities, from insider trading to arms deals and bringing down governments. As they battle to expose the truth, they find the corrupt organisation not only has the law on its side, but will kill to keep the secrets safe. Thriller, starring Clive Owen and Naomi Watts

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: A hard-drinking sheriff and his deputy are pitted against a sadistic cartel hitman. Crime thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Ian McShane and John Leguizamo

programme.title: Follow
programme.desc: A young man gets a strange Christmas gift from his girlfriend, blacks out and then wakes up the next day to find his life crumbling around him. Horror, starring Noah Segan, Haley Lu Richardson and Don Most

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Two New York cops arrest a hitman working for the Japanese Mafia, and are ordered to extradite him back to Osaka to stand trial. However, the prisoner gives them the slip on arrival, and as the detectives hunt him down with the aid of local law enforcement officers they become snared in a vicious gang war. Ridley Scott's thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia, Ken Takakura and Yasaku Matsuda

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr

programme.title: The Last Castle
programme.desc: A distinguished lieutenant general suffers the indignity of a court martial and ends up behind bars in a high-security military jail, where the chief warden keeps order with an iron fist. Outraged by the guards' behaviour, the fallen hero sets out to expose the violations with the help of his fellow prisoners. Thriller, starring Robert Redford, James Gandolfini, Delroy Lindo, Mark Ruffalo and Clifton Collins Jr

programme.title: Die Hard 4.0
programme.desc: Tough New York cop John McClane is sent to escort a computer hacker to Washington for questioning. During this routine operation he stumbles on a criminal mastermind's plan to launch a technological terrorist attack on the US, and is forced to enlist the hacker's aid in foiling the evil scheme. Action thriller sequel, with Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long and Maggie Q

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: A mysterious signal is transmitted to every mobile phone in the world, causing those who hear it to turn into bloodthirsty maniacs. A writer who was unaffected by the transmission bands together with a few other survivors to track down his family and unlock the mystery behind the crisis. Sci-fi thriller based on Stephen King's novel, starring John Cusack and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: A successful author finds his relief at being rescued from a near-fatal car crash is severely tempered by the discovery that his saviour is a fan with psychopathic tendencies. The situation takes a turn for the worse when she discovers he has killed off her favourite character - and sets about coercing him to do a rewrite in nightmarish fashion. Oscar-winning thriller, starring James Caan, Kathy Bates and Lauren Bacall

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film(n)

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: A family's amiable St Bernard is bitten by a rabid bat and, as the infection takes hold, the devoted dog is transformed into a vicious killer - eventually trapping a mother and her son in their car in the baking heat of an isolated junkyard. Horror based on Stephen King's novel, starring Dee Wallace Stone, Daniel Hugh-Kelly and Danny Pintauro(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster(n)

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: Medical student Nancy Adams' plan to honour her late mother puts her face to face with a massive, man-eating shark. Survival horror, starring Blake Lively and Oscar Jaenada(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard(n)

programme.title: Nocturnal Animals
programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the city's gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell(n)

programme.title: Abattoir
programme.desc: A reporter investigates the story of a man trying to build a haunted house out of rooms where terrible things have happened. Horror from Saw veteran Darren Lynn Bousman, starring Joe Anderson, Jessica Lowndes and Lin Shaye

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee

programme.title: Ibiza Undead
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when a shady Ibiza club owner decides to spice up his shows by smuggling in undead performers. British horror-comedy, starring Cara Theobold, Emily Atack and Matt King

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Cameras follow events that took place at a 1970s Pennsylvania research facility used to investigate the existence of supernatural powers. Found-footage horror, starring Rya Kihlstedt, William Mapother and Sharon Maughan

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bosses
programme.desc: A corporate employee stuck in a boring job sees the promotion he has long coveted handed to one of his old enemies. When his co-workers start going through strange changes, he realises the situation is even worse - his rival is a vampire, and has evil plans in mind for the business. Comedy horror, starring Fran Kranz and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Cameras follow events that took place at a 1970s Pennsylvania research facility used to investigate the existence of supernatural powers. Found-footage horror, starring Rya Kihlstedt, William Mapother and Sharon Maughan

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoeven's sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: A student watches a video of a murder on the internet, but the police refuse to believe the events in the film are real. She sets out to prove someone really has been killed, only to find herself trapped in a deadly game and in danger of becoming the murderer's next target. Thriller, starring Melanie Papalia and David Schlachtenhaufen

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A man wakes from a coma to discover Britain has been struck by a terrifying experimental virus that sends victims into a homicidal rage. With a handful of other survivors, he heads for Manchester, the last outpost unaffected by the outbreak - but realises the virus is not the only threat. Danny Boyle's horror, starring Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Brendan Gleeson and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: A computer genius hacks into the mainframe of the company he used to work for, hoping to find evidence against the executive who stole his ideas. However, the intelligent master program running the system transports him into an electronic world, where he is forced to battle gladiators in a series of deadly games. Disney sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner and David Warner

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind: Collector's Edition
programme.desc: An electrical repairman sees a fleet of UFOs and develops an increasing fascination with mountain-shaped forms, driving his wife to despair. Meanwhile, another woman has a similar fixation after her son mysteriously vanishes, and a team of scientists investigates a series of strange events around the world. Eventually, they are all drawn to a mountain where aliens are about to make contact. Alternate cut of Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, with Richard Dreyfuss, Francois Truffaut and Teri Garr

programme.title: Blade Runner: Theatrical Version
programme.desc: Premiere. A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Ridley Scott's definitive version of his sci-fi thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg assassin is sent on a murderous mission back in time to the 20th century, where he wreaks havoc while searching for his intended victim - a woman whose unborn son is destined to lead the human race in a war against machines. However, a soldier has also been sent from the future to protect her. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind: Collector's Edition
programme.desc: An electrical repairman sees a fleet of UFOs and develops an increasing fascination with mountain-shaped forms, driving his wife to despair. Meanwhile, another woman has a similar fixation after her son mysteriously vanishes, and a team of scientists investigates a series of strange events around the world. Eventually, they are all drawn to a mountain where aliens are about to make contact. Alternate cut of Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, with Richard Dreyfuss, Francois Truffaut and Teri Garr

programme.title: The Greatest Sci-fi Movies in the Universe
programme.desc: Alex Zane counts down the UK's favourite sci-fi films as voted for by Sky viewers

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover

programme.title: Blade Runner: Theatrical Version
programme.desc: Premiere. A former cop in a bleak future Los Angeles is forced to return to duty for a mission to hunt down and kill a group of renegade android replicants. The fugitives have escaped from a space colony to find their creator on Earth, in a bid to prolong their limited lifespan. Ridley Scott's definitive version of his sci-fi thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg assassin is sent on a murderous mission back in time to the 20th century, where he wreaks havoc while searching for his intended victim - a woman whose unborn son is destined to lead the human race in a war against machines. However, a soldier has also been sent from the future to protect her. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton and Michael Biehn(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: A police officer in a future Detroit ravaged by crime is seemingly killed in the line of duty, but is rebuilt as a law-enforcing cyborg by the corporation that has taken over running the force. He begins to remember his human life and seeks to bring his killers to justice - a mission that leads him to turn on his corrupt corporate masters. Sci-fi thriller, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Ronny Cox and Miguel Ferrer(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films(n)

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem
programme.desc: A spaceship crash results in the infestation of a small town by aliens, so a Predator is despatched to hunt them down - and any superfluous humans who happen to get in the way. However, an even bigger threat is lurking in the area, in the form of a terrifying hybrid of the two extraterrestrial creatures. Sci-fi action sequel, starring Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth and John Ortiz(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman(n)

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem
programme.desc: A spaceship crash results in the infestation of a small town by aliens, so a Predator is despatched to hunt them down - and any superfluous humans who happen to get in the way. However, an even bigger threat is lurking in the area, in the form of a terrifying hybrid of the two extraterrestrial creatures. Sci-fi action sequel, starring Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth and John Ortiz(n)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Hardened fighters from all over the world, including military veterans and ruthless criminals, are abducted by aliens and transported to a dangerous jungle world. As they struggle to survive, they discover why they have been brought to the planet - to be used as prey in a big-game hunt. Sci-fi thriller sequel, with Adrien Brody, Topher Grace, Alice Braga, Danny Trejo and Laurence Fishburne(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr(n)

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Two decades have passed since Earth was saved from an extraterrestrial invasion, and in the years since, the aliens' salvaged technology has been used to transform the world. However, it may not be enough to save the human race when a second, even dealier attack begins. Sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth and Bill Pullman(n)

programme.title: Species
programme.desc: Scientists use extraterrestrial technology to create a human-alien hybrid that grows to become a beautiful femme fatale with terrifying powers and a murderous disposition. The creature escapes into Los Angeles seeking a suitable man to mate with and kills anyone that gets in her way. Sci-fi thriller, starring Natasha Henstridge, Ben Kingsley, Michael Madsen, Alfred Molina and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Hardened fighters from all over the world, including military veterans and ruthless criminals, are abducted by aliens and transported to a dangerous jungle world. As they struggle to survive, they discover why they have been brought to the planet - to be used as prey in a big-game hunt. Sci-fi thriller sequel, with Adrien Brody, Topher Grace, Alice Braga, Danny Trejo and Laurence Fishburne(n)

programme.title: Salt and Fire
programme.desc: Scientists investigating rare geological formations in Bolivia are abducted by a rogue businessman. Eco-thriller from director Werner Herzog, starring Michael Shannon, Veronica Ferres and Gael Garcia Bernal

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman

programme.title: Hyena Road
programme.desc: Adept Canadian sharpshooter Ryan Sanders and his unit are forced to take refuge with an village elder while on the run from Taliban fanatics in Afghanistan. Resigned to their fate, the soldiers anxiously wait for the old man to betray them to his countrymen, but instead he saves their lives, then disappears without a trace. When Sanders reports this unusual turn of events on his return to Kandahar, seasoned intelligence officer Pete Mitchell is convinced the sniper has happened upon the legendary Afghan freedom fighter known as the Ghost, and enlists Sanders' aid in tracking the man down once again to assist in the war effort. Military drama, starring Rossif Sutherland and director Paul Gross

programme.title: Journey to the Shore
programme.desc: A wife's husband returns to her three years after he drowned at sea, and she agrees to let him take her on a journey. Drama, starring Eri Fukatsu and Tadanobu Asano

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young New Yorker's plan to have a kid on her own is derailed when she falls for a married man. Romantic comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Ethan Hawke and Bill Hader

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish CIA researcher returns to his field office to find all his colleagues have been murdered in his absence. When he tries to uncover the truth, he also ends up targeted for assassination by his own agency, and is forced to go on the run to discover the reasons why. Sydney Pollack's thriller, starring Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson and Max von Sydow

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: The Confirmation
programme.desc: When his tools are stolen, a divorced, down-on-his-luck handyman and his young son attempt to track down the culprits. Comedy, starring Clive Owen, Jaeden Lieberher and Maria Bello

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Two supermarket checkout girls covering for their friends on Christmas Eve get drawn into a drugs sting and are forced to cross a dealer to save themselves. Their absent colleagues endure a disastrous night's gambling in Las Vegas, while two men forced to take part in the sting find themselves spending a festive night with a narcotics agent. Drama, starring Katie Holmes, William Fichtner and JE Freeman

programme.title: Tiger Raid
programme.desc: While on a covert mission, two cold-blooded mercenaries form an unlikely bond as they race across the desert in the dead of night. Action thriller, starring Damien Molony and Sofia Boutella

programme.title: Night Fare
programme.desc: When two old friends partying in Paris skip out on a taxi fare they wind up on the wrong side of a manhunt. Thriller, starring Jonathan Howard, Jonathan Demurger and Fanny Valette

programme.title: Alena
programme.desc: A misfit teen is targeted by bullies, but is protected by a friend who's as loyal as she is mysterious. Swedish horror-thriller, starring Amalia Holm, Helena Af Sandeberg and Johan Ehn

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai

programme.title: American Fable
programme.desc: When 11-year-old Gitty discovers that her beloved father is hiding a wealthy man in her family's silo in order to save their struggling farm, she is forced to choose between saving the man's life or protecting her family from the consequences of their actions. Thriller, starring Peyton Kennedy, Richard Schiff and Kip Pardue

programme.title: Goat
programme.desc: New college student Brad is desperate to fit into his new surroundings, so taking a cue from his older brother, he decides to pledge a fraternity. All goes well at first as he attends parties and meets several girls, but as he enters into the final stretch of the pledging ritual-known as hell week, Brad finds things taking a violent turn as he has to endure a series of brutal initiation rituals. Fact-based drama, with Ben Schnetzer and Nick Jonas

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: A basketball hustler working Los Angeles' courts uses his goofy appearance to lull his opponents into a false sense of security. He forms an uneasy alliance with a fellow conman and rival to make a financial killing, but his debts soon catch up with both of them. Ron Shelton's comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes and Rosie Perez

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A single mother is determined to keep her daughter safe from harm when burglars break into their home. The pair hide out in a specially constructed sealed room, but the shelter becomes a prison when the robbers refuse to leave empty-handed. Thriller directed by David Fincher, starring Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto and Dwight Yoakam

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Brash yuppie car dealer Charlie discovers his deceased father has left the family fortune to Raymond, the autistic elder brother he never knew he had. In a bid to get his hands on the money, he tracks down and abducts Raymond - but the ensuing cross-country journey proves to be a profound learning experience. Oscar-winning drama, starring Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman, with Valeria Golino, Gerald R Molen and Jack Murdock

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: A baby is born with the physique of a geriatric, and over the course of his lengthy and eventful life he grows steadily younger. A girl he meets in his early years becomes his true love, but as they age in different directions, both realise they have only a limited time to be together. David Fincher's romantic fantasy drama, starring Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Taraji P Henson and Tilda Swinton

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Fact-based crime thriller about the tortuous hunt for a mysterious serial killer who terrorised San Francisco in the late 1960s and early 1970s, and taunted the police and media with cryptic messages. Three men became obsessed with identifying the murderer after his reign of terror inexplicably stopped, but their fixation with the case took a heavy toll on their lives. Starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo and Brian Cox

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A single mother is determined to keep her daughter safe from harm when burglars break into their home. The pair hide out in a specially constructed sealed room, but the shelter becomes a prison when the robbers refuse to leave empty-handed. Thriller directed by David Fincher, starring Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto and Dwight Yoakam

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane(n)

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda(n)

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two maverick cops set out to topple a drugs baron who has transformed an apartment block into a seemingly impregnable fortress, but reckon without the villain's determination to stay out of jail - leading to explosive confrontations. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson, Chris Rock and Allen Payne(n)

programme.title: The Fencer
programme.desc: A champion fencer fleeing from the Soviet secret service inspires Estonian schoolchildren to take up the sport. Drama, starring Mart Avandi and Ursula Ratasepp(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his untimely death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged(n)

programme.title: The Brand New Testament
programme.desc: God secretly lives in Brussels, spending his time enacting spiteful punishments on the human race. His rebellious daughter tries to teach him a lesson by sending everyone on Earth a message containing the date of their death. As the world is plunged into chaos, she flees from her furious father - who gains a new insight into his creation. Comedy, starring Pili Groyne, Benoit Poelvoorde and Catherine Deneuve. In French and German(n)

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: The students of a Texas high-school enjoy the last day of term in 1976, spending their time in pursuit of sex, drink or drugs. Meanwhile, the newly arrived freshmen are put through a series of humiliating initiation pranks. Richard Linklater's comedy drama, starring Ben Affleck, Milla Jovovich, Matthew McConaughey and Parker Posey(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander(n)

programme.title: American Honey
programme.desc: A poor teenager leaves home and hits the road with a crew of magazine sellers. She gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love while crossing the Midwest Inuted States. Drama, starring Sasha Lane, Shia LaBeouf and Riley Keough(n)

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: A professor of literature becomes addicted to gambling, leaving him in serious debt to a brutal loan shark and forcing him to take yet more desperate risks to escape his problem. Drama, starring James Caan, Lauren Hutton and Paul Sorvino(n)

programme.title: Return of the One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Fang Gang is now happily married and living a quiet life when emissaries of eight gang leaders begin touring the country, inviting blade-fighting teachers to a competition to establish who is the deadliest of all. The catch is that most entrants will die and refusal to participate means summary execution. Fang Gang is soon forced to take on each of the eight, all of whom possess different, but equally lethal, supernatural abilities with their chosen weapons. Martial arts action sequel, starring Jimmy Wang. In Mandarin

programme.title: Oh! What a Lovely War
programme.desc: First World War musical, comprising a series of satirical sketches highlighting the futility of conflict from the perspective of the ordinary soldiers - many from the same family - and covering famous historical moments, including the Christmas truce. Richard Attenborough's directorial debut, starring Ralph Richardson, Laurence Olivier, John Mills and John Gielgud

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: A former Union scout is befriended by famed chief Cochise after he saves the life of a native boy. Having witnessed 10 years of conflict between Apaches and advancing settlers, the veteran soldier seizes the fleeting chance to broker a ceasefire between the two sides. Western, starring James Stewart, Jeff Chandler, Debra Paget and Basil Ruysdael

programme.title: Hatari
programme.desc: A group of reckless animal trappers travels through the wilds of Africa, but the arrival of a beautiful photographer looks set to cause upheaval among the group. Comedy adventure, starring John Wayne, Red Buttons, Hardy Kruger, Elsa Martinelli and Michele Girardon

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A young farm boy discovers a dragon's egg, which hatches into the last surviving specimen of its mighty race. His friendship with the winged creature soon comes in handy when he discovers he is destined to overthrow the evil tyrant who has taken control of the kingdom. Fantasy adventure, starring Ed Speleers, Jeremy Irons, Robert Carlyle and Sienna Guillory, with Rachel Weisz providing the voice of the dragon

programme.title: This Is England
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Shaun lives with his mother in a shabby council flat in a bleak northern town and is lacking direction after losing his father in the Falklands War. At school, he is befriended by a skinhead gang and the leader takes the boy under his wing - a tie that draws Shaun into a world of racism and violence, but one where he begins to find a new identity. Shane Meadows' drama set in the 1980s, starring Thomas Turgoose, Stephen Graham and Jo Hartley

programme.title: Quadrophenia
programme.desc: A teenager in 1960s London is unhappy with his lot in life, but believes he has found a place to belong in the mod subculture and their feud with the rival rockers. As the mods gather in Brighton for a weekend that turns to violence, his naive vision of the world is cruelly shattered. Drama based on the Who album, starring Phil Daniels, Leslie Ash, Sting and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A heroin addict makes a series of attempts to kick the habit, but the grind of everyday life and a circle of similarly self-destructive friends keep dragging him back to his old ways. Following a near-fatal overdose, he comes to the realisation that the only way to put his life in order is to rid himself of his friends - which is easier said than done. Danny Boyle's drama based on Irvine Welsh's novel, starring Ewan McGregor, Robert Carlyle and Ewen Bremner

programme.title: Destry Rides Again
programme.desc: A mild-mannered sheriff is assigned to clean up a lawless town ruled over by a ruthless gangster - but finds his biggest problem is a sultry saloon singer determined to exact revenge on him for resisting her charms. Comedy Western, starring James Stewart, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Winninger, Mischa Auer and Brian Donlevy

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson are asked to protect the last remaining member of the aristocratic Baskerville family, who is believed to be the target of a monstrous spectral hound roaming the remote Devon moors. Hammer version of Arthur Conan Doyle's mystery, starring Peter Cushing, Andre Morrell, Christopher Lee, John Le Mesurier and Miles Malleson

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: An arrogant Austrian mountaineer tries to become the first to conquer a peak in India that has claimed the lives of 11 previous climbers. However, the outbreak of the Second World War leaves him languishing in a PoW camp. He escapes and ends up in the holy city of Lhasa, where he befriends the 14-year-old Dalai Lama and learns the meaning of inner peace. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, David Thewlis and BD Wong

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: A new student finds herself a social outcast during her first year of college, but soon acquires a new circle of friends in a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing. She joins their a cappella group and leads them to compete in the campus music competitions. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Shut In
programme.desc: Premiere. Three criminals break into Anna's house and reveal their intentions to kill her, meaning the severely agoraphobic woman must either turn the tables on the intruders or die. A deadly battle for control begins, which reveals a far darker side to her personality. Horror thriller, starring Beth Riesgraf and Rory Culkin

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
programme.desc: A police officer uses a radio phone-in as bait to trap psychopathic killer Leatherface, determined to ensure he pays for murdering a group of youngsters. Horror sequel, starring Dennis Hopper, Caroline Williams, Jim Siedow, Bill Moseley and Bill Johnson(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien ambassador lands his spaceship in America and warns humanity that Earth risks imminent destruction by an interplanetary alliance unless it abandons its warlike ways - and is promptly shot by the military. The wounded visitor is forced to live among humans, but his powerful robot servant is poised to punish mankind for its aggression. Sci-fi drama, with Michael Rennie, Patricia Neal and Hugh Marlowe(n)

programme.title: Just Wright
programme.desc: A physical therapist is delighted to get a prestigious job treating a star basketball player. She falls for her patient, leaving her conflicted and fearing for the consequences to her career if she pursues a relationship. However, he seems more interested in her best friend. Romantic comedy, starring Queen Latifah, Common, Paula Patton and Pam Grier(n)

programme.title: Carry On Cabby
programme.desc: The neglected wife of a workaholic taxi owner grows increasingly tired of his lack of interest in their marriage. In a ploy to bring him to his senses, she secretly launches a rival cab firm with a driver roster made up of attractive women, who soon tempt his customers away. Comedy, starring Sid James, Hattie Jacques, Kenneth Connor and Charles Hawtrey(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jess befriends a new girl at school, and the pair begin to create their own imaginary kingdom in a secret place in the woods to escape the difficulties of their real lives. Unfortunately, a tragedy threatens to bring their fantasy world to an end. Drama based on Katherine Paterson's novel, starring Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel and Robert Patrick(n)

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistress's evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrant's rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron(n)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Roman general Maximus Decimus Meridius is a casualty of a power struggle between the corrupt Emperor Commodus and the senate. Ordered to be put to death along with his family, he escapes his would-be killers but is sold into slavery as a gladiator - but uses his fame in the arena to fight against the tyrant. Oscar-winning period epic, with Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Derek Jacobi and Oliver Reed, in his last film role(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob worries about how different he looks from his brothers and sisters, and begins to wonder if John and Olivia really are his parents

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben starts to hunt animals for their skins to sell for profit. John-Boy organises a reenactment of a famous historical battle, leaving Grandpa ashamed, as he has exaggerated his own part in the actual event

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson is tricked by a salesman into thinking she can get rich quick by converting her family restaurant into a fast-food franchise

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family recalls past Christmas celebrations while trapped by a sudden snowstorm. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert and Michael Landon

programme.title: Coco Chanel
programme.desc: Part two of two. The remarkable life of seamstress Coco Chanel, who was an impoverished child living in an orphanage until she became a dress-maker's assistant, and from there rose to become a pioneering icon and the owner of France's leading fashion house. Drama, starring Shirley MacLaine and Malcolm McDowell

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan meets a teenager with a learning disability. who is living on the streets, and tries to find a family to take care of him

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Heavenly Kind.
programme.desc: Jonathan offers encouragement to a bullied orphan who is in danger of being taken away from his grandfather

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark gets a job working for a movie star who hates all men. They both wish they could trade places - only for their request to be granted

programme.title: Dallas: The Early Years
programme.desc: Prequel to the long-running American soap, exploring the origins of the feud between the Ewing and Barnes oil dynasties. Family patriarchs Digger and Jock become friends as they seek their fortune during the Depression, but greed and love for the same woman turns them into bitter enemies. Drama, starring David Marshall Grant and Dale Midkiff, and featuring an introduction with Larry Hagman

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason struggles to complete a major musical composition for his course, and a plan for a Walton's Mountain Founders' Day develops to help inspire him in his task

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson is tricked by a salesman into thinking she can get rich quick by converting her family restaurant into a fast-food franchise

programme.title: Love Finds a Home
programme.desc: A female doctor in a small 19th-century town looks after a friend in the last stages of pregnancy, but finds herself continually at odds with her patient's mother-in-law, who believes in homeopathic treatments. The doctor also has to contend with her daughter's first love and her own inability to conceive. Period drama sequel, based on Janette Oke's novel, starring Sarah Jones and Haylie Duff

programme.title: Love Takes Wing
programme.desc: A doctor takes up a new position in a small frontier town, where a mysterious illness is afflicting the residents. The medic takes desperate measures to stop the infection spreading, but also has to convince suspicious townsfolk that a local orphanage is not the source of the disease. Drama, starring Sarah Jones, Haylie Duff, Patrick Duffy and Cloris Leachman

programme.title: Love's Unfolding Dream
programme.desc: A woman in 19th-century America aspires to be a doctor and her dreams seem to come true when she nurses a wealthy socialite who offers to pay for her to enrol at medical school. However, an unexpected encounter with a handsome lawyer forces her to reconsider what she really wants. Period drama, starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Nancy Linehan Charles and Patrick Levis

programme.title: Hunt for the Labyrinth Killer
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney works alongside the police in the hunt for a mysterious serial killer, who lures his victims into elaborate and deadly traps. However, the case takes a personal dimension when her own father, a retired judge, is accused of being the murderer. Mystery thriller, starring Amanda Schull and Michael Nouri

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Five teenagers united by an obsession with celebrity steal from the houses of the rich and famous stars they idolise, using the internet to follow their targets' movements. When the police finally catch up with them, the arrest brings a taste of the fame they have craved. Fact-based drama, starring Emma Watson and Israel Broussard

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy takes in a runaway child fleeing from her abusive stepfather. However, Grandpa is suspicious of her story

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura's determination to save a new orchard from the ravages of drought puts her unborn child's life in danger. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert

programme.title: Runaway Car
programme.desc: The accelerator on a woman's car jams, leaving its passengers facing a terrifying ordeal as they attempt to find a way of bringing the vehicle to a stop. Action thriller, with Judge Reinhold, Nina Siemaszko, Brian Hooks and Leon

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An airmail plane has engine trouble and the pilot has to take emergency measures by landing the craft in the Waltons' meadow

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A jealous John-Boy runs into possible competition for the attention of his favourite schoolteacher

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen falls for a college student, while Grandma starts to feel the effects of old age as she reaches her 68th birthday

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia embarks on a one-woman strike, prompting John to take her on a belated honeymoon after 19 years of marriage

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: After emerging from a bitter divorce battle, single mother Joanna returns to the sleepy home town she could not wait to flee as a teenager. As she sets about rekindling old friendships, Joanna finds herself falling in love with an old flame. However, the man is married, and the pair's affair threatens to rock the community. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams and Kristen Holden-Ried

programme.title: Tears in the Rain
programme.desc: An American woman tries to fulfil her mother's dying wish by delivering a letter to an English lord, who denies ever having known her. When she falls in love with his son, the suspicious aristocrat delves into the American's past - only to realise she may be his daughter. Romantic drama, starring Sharon Stone and Christopher Cazenove

programme.title: Barbara Taylor Bradford's A Secret Affair
programme.desc: An American woman breaks off her engagement to begin a new life with a journalist, but unfortunately her lover disappears while on a reporting assignment in Serbia. Drama adapted from Barbara Taylor Bradford's novel, starring Janine Turner, Fionnula Flanagan and Robert Mailhouse

programme.title: The Thorn Birds: The Missing Years
programme.desc: Part one of a sequel to the blockbuster TV drama, exploring the period of history skipped over in the original series, following the cross-continental escapades of a wartime priest (Richard Chamberlain), his illicit lover (Amanda Donohoe), and her brutish husband. While raising her family in the Australian Outback, the wayward wife dabbles in deceit to keep the truth about the priest's illegitimate child from her husband. Also starring Simon Westaway, Julia Blake and Olivia Burnette

programme.title: The Thorn Birds: The Missing Years
programme.desc: Part two of a sequel to the blockbuster TV drama, exploring the period of history skipped over in the original series, following the cross-continental escapades of a wartime priest (Richard Chamberlain), his illicit lover (Amanda Donohoe), and her brutish husband. While raising her family in the Australian Outback, the wayward wife dabbles in deceit to keep the truth about the priest's illegitimate child from her husband. Also starring Simon Westaway, Julia Blake and Olivia Burnette

programme.title: The Good Mistress
programme.desc: Sandy Cooper, a struggling alcoholic with a troubled past, moves to a new town in an attempt to start over. On arriving, she strikes up a passionate relationship with a charming stranger. However, it turns out her mysterious lover is actually her best friend's politician husband, and he will stoop to any means necessary to keep his indiscretions a secret. Thriller, starring Annie Heise and Antonio Cupo

programme.title: Jodi Arias: Dirty Little Secret
programme.desc: An aspiring photographer stands trial for the murder of her former lover. She maintains that she killed him in self-defence, while her increasingly salacious revelations in court about her relationship with the victim turn the trial into a media circus. Fact-based drama, starring Tania Raymonde and Jesse Lee Soffer

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma organises a traditional quilting as Mary Ellen's birthday approaches, but Mary Ellen rejects the custom as demeaning to her(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A present-day couple buy an antique, folding-leaf table with a large letter I branded on it and are curious to learn about its origins. Drama, starring Michael Landon(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: James and Cassandra's uncle arrives in Walnut Grove to visit the newly adopted youngsters, only to shock the Ingalls family by announcing he will sue for custody of the two children(n)

programme.title: Elvis: The Early Years
programme.desc: The first in a two-part biopic of the king of rock 'n' roll, Elvis Presley, charting his humble beginnings in Tupelo, Mississippi, to his recordings at Sun Studios in Memphis and his conscription into the US army. Jonathan Rhys Meyers plays the singer, with Rose McGowan, Camryn Manheim and Randy Quaid(n)

programme.desc: A look back at the historical events of the queen's reign(n)

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: A beautiful woman arouses the ardour of three rival suitors in 19th-century rural Dorset and, having flirted and toyed with their affections, she chooses to marry a caddish, gambling soldier - a decision that leads to a sequence of harrowing events. John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's classic novel, with Julie Christie, Alan Bates, Terence Stamp and Peter Finch(n)

programme.title: A Walton Wedding
programme.desc: Eldest son John-Boy, now a journalist living in 1960s New York, invites the family to attend his wedding, but finds them taking over the planning. In need of solitude, he returns home to research an article on his grandmother's life. Family drama based on the TV series, starring Richard Thomas, Ralph Waite, Michael Learned and Kate McNeil(n)

programme.title: A Wedding on Walton's Mountain
programme.desc: Drama based on the popular TV series. Erin's happy engagement to Paul Northridge is put in doubt by Ashley's unexpected return from the war, leaving her facing an impossible decision between suitors. Ralph Waite, Mary Beth McDonough, Louis Welch and Morgan Stevens star(n)

programme.title: Come Dance at My Wedding
programme.desc: A woman about to get married plans to sell off her dead mother's dance studio, only to find it is partly the property of her father, whom she has never met. She and her estranged parent quickly form a connection, but she finds he is reluctant to see his ex-wife's cherished business close down, while her fiance feels threatened by his new in-law. Drama, starring John Schneider and Brooke Nevin(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: A safecracker comes dangerously close to getting caught red-handed, so decides the time has come to quit his life of crime. However, an old friend soon tempts him back with the chance to steal a priceless French artefact being stored in a customs house, and he joins forces with a talented young thief to carry out one last heist. Crime thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando and Angela Bassett(n)

programme.title: Grace Is Gone
programme.desc: Upon hearing his wife was killed in the Iraq war, a father takes his two daughters on a road trip to Florida. Drama, starring John Cusack, Shelan O'Keefe and Gracie Bednarczyk(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn

programme.title: A Season With Navy Football: Episode 1
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Ken Niumatalolo and the USNA Midshipmen as they take on the Florida Atlantic Owls. Season premiere(c)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: For two centuries, Andrew, a popular robot model, learns all he might about the intricacies of humanity, life and love, and teaches as much as he learns. Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance

programme.title: Conan the Destroyer
programme.desc: Conan (Arnold Schwarzenegger) and his friend Malak (Tracey Walter) are paid an unfriendly visit by Queen Taramis (Sarah Douglas) and her guards. The Queen tells Conan that she has the power to bring his dead love, Valeria, back to life. In return, she asks him to take her niece, Princess Jehnna (Olivia D'abo) on a journey to find a key, which unlocks a treasure. The Queen instructs him to return the treasure and her niece to her, unharmed

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: When the seaside community of Amity finds itself under attack by a dangerous great white shark, the town's chief of police (Roy Scheider), a young marine biologist (Richard Dreyfuss) and a grizzled shark hunter (Robert Shaw) embark on a desperate quest to destroy the beast before it strikes again

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water! The beach-goers of Amity are threatened again by a giant, man-eating shark in this thrilling sequel to Spielberg's masterpiece. When signs of a new man-eater begin to wash up, Police Chief Brody must convince the town of the danger and kill the monster. Oscar nominee Roy Scheider returns along with the famous John Williams score

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: At Sea World of Florida, an ingenious new Undersea Kingdom is about to open. A maze of transparent tunnels, beneath the park's lagoon, takes visitors through a teeming world of exotic sea life. There is also an uninvited guest however. Entering through a damaged sea gate, separating the park from the ocean, a great white shark becomes trapped in the lagoon. Panic spreads through the holiday crowd. In a primal frenzy, the shark devours anything which prevents its escape

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: After losing a son to yet another shark attack, Ellen Brody, (LORRAINE GARY), attempts to resurrect her life away from Amity by joining her marine biologist son Michael (LANCE CUEST), in the Bahamas - where great whites have never been known to venture. One day, a mysterious man named Hoagie (MICHAEL CAINE) enters her life, and a romance begins to build. Their courtship is abruptly disrupted by events that threaten their lives, and nearly destroy, the remainder of Ellen Brody's small family

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)

programme.title: Gary Owen: I Got My Associates
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Gary Owen shares stories of being married to the daughter of a founding member of the Black Panthers, being the father of young teenagers and, of course, his hillbilly family. Filmed at the Stardome in Hoover, Alabama, the special also includes Gary recounting his time in the military, celebrity weddings and bumping into Lebron James in the bathroom

programme.title: SHOWTIME BOXING: Special Edition: Benavidez vs. Gavril
programme.desc: 20 year-old rising star David Benavidez (18-0, 17 KOs) and hard-hitting contender Ronald Gavril (18-1, 14 KOs) battle it out for the vacant super middleweight championship. Plus, two 10-round super middleweight showdowns: J'Leon Love (23-1, 13 KOs) goes up against Texas-native Abraham Han (26-3, 16 KOs) and undefeated prospect Caleb Plant (15-0, 10 KOs)takes on Andrew Hernandez (19-6-1, 9 KOs). Live from The Joint at Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas(c)

programme.title: Sold
programme.desc: Mickey's screenwriting dreams stall out - until he's pulled into a gruesome fix for Daryll's movie star client. Abby starts construction on the new bar while Ray searches for a solution to their problem. programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(c)

programme.title: Episode 502
programme.desc: Matt's tryst with Danika goes viral - and no amount of damage control can contain it. Matt tries to take matters into his own hands by calling Elliot Salad, the head of the network, to plead his case but ends up getting more than he bargained for. Meanwhile, life goes on for the rest of the world. Sean and Beverly endure a disastrous casting session with Tim. And Carol gets stoned with her maid(n)
