programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.desc: Double bill. Thera is a certainty to win the skateboarding competition until she gets a crush on superstar skate boy Ned Falcon. Then, Les leads his team of awesomisers against a rival group

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy learns that a beloved Norrisville philanthropist is his enemy - the only problem is convincing Howard that their hero is a villain. Then, when a Mexican Death Bear runs amok at school, Randy and Howard realise they should have paid more attention during Spanish class

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. When Randy runs out of smoke bombs, he must find a sacred tree whose sap is the key to making more. However, the problems is that it is McFist's Christmas tree

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer tries to get Ponzi to resign and become a ribbon dancer. Then, Spencer wakes after a sleepover with no memory of the night's events and Billy missing

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy gives Spencer a mystical hat that promises to give limitless confidence to the wearer. Then, Billy tries out Principal Ponzi's experimental hair-growing machine

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: King of the Pipsqueaks/Down the Creek.
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat's technology and lightning bring Old Lady Munson's garden gnomes to life. Then, Millie tires of living in Bootsville, because nothing ever happens

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Cop and Dennis prepare for Space Camp, but Mr Cheeks comes to exact revenge on Kat. Then, birthday boy Coop enjoys some rooftop bowling

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: After discovering his family is moving because Norrisville is getting too dangerous, Randy decides he must defeat Cyborg Julian and make his town safe so that his parents will change their mind

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Last Stall on the Left/Got Stank.
programme.desc: Double bill. New kid Randy Cunningham is the latest in a long line of ninjas who have protected Norrisville High School for 800 years. On his first day at school he faces danger. Randy and Howard try to get themselves into the cool seats for the school game by painting themselves with blue body paint

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. The half-boy, half-oyster pretends he is a snowboarding expert, even though he has never done it before. Then, Rafik asks Boyster to make him some pearls to impress new girl Claudine

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Lawn Gnome Beach Party of Terror.
programme.desc: The boys create a tropical paradise in the backyard, while Perry tries to stop Dr Doofenshmirtz's plan to steal garden gnomes

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.desc: Perceived by the public as menaces, Hulk and Spider-Man are the only ones left to save the planet from destruction when The Collector captures every last hero on Earth

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: Doctor Doom summons the Midgard Serpent using a powerful Asgardian weapon and Thor believes he must sacrifice himself to save the world

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The Guardians crash land on a space station run by the Grandmaster, who schemes to get Drax back in the gladiatorial arena to battle his ultimate opponent, Gamora

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.desc: Spider-Man and his team have to fight Dr Octopus's latest creation, Venom, a task made even harder when it starts to bond with each of them in turn

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel's weird new boyfriend discloses some of the town's strange and uncanny secrets. Dipper finds a mysterious journal that hints at more of the town's hidden secrets

programme.title: Star Wars Freemaker Adventures
programme.desc: Kordi's attempts to save money forces the Freemakers into trouble on Kashyyyk. Animated adventures

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: When Worlds Collide/The Road to Danville.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys must stop a strange planet from colliding with Earth. Then, Doof and Perry get lost in the desert

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace is put in charge of the boys, just as there's a power cut. They use the opportunity to make the most of the blackout. Ferb and Perry return from a trip to find they have missed a lot while they were out of town. Phineas and the gang have been training domestic squirrels to live in the wild

programme.title: Mech-X4
programme.sub-title: Let's Call It Mech-X4! - Parts One and Two.
programme.desc: Double-bill. When Ryan Walker's mysterious new power leads him to a giant robot, he and his friends go up against a monstrous threat

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Phineas and Ferb Interrupted/A Real Boy.
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace thinks spending the day with her mother will give her a chance to get the better of the boys, and Doof erases Vanessa's memory

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Mommy Can You Hear Me?/Road Trip.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys try to stop Candace from getting bored when she is bedridden after injuring her ankle. Then, they build a diner on top of their caravan while on a road trip

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Stan throws a party to promote his business, and Dipper tries to impress Wendy by cloning himself

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper arranges a showdown with Robbie, and asks a character from his favourite arcade game to help him fight it out. Meanwhile, Mabel tries to cure Stan of his fear of heights

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: One Good Scare Ought to Do It.
programme.desc: The boys build a haunted house ride in the back yard in a bid to cure Isabella's hiccups

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys organise a medieval tournament while on holiday in England. The, the duo build robots that become impossible to control

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.sub-title: Lab Rats: Bionic Island: Bionic Rebellion - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The heroes discover a confidante has secretly formed an evil rebellion to take revenge for his father's death by killing Davenport, leading to a bionic battle

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.desc: Zendaya and friends from the cast of KC Undercover join the pranksters to pull off an epic fashion show prank, leaving the target thinking she has caused a runway disaster and sending a fashion designer over the edge

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: I Was a Middle-Aged Robot/Suddenly Susy.
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace takes part in a series of competitions with her father and the help of Doof's robot. Later, Candace babysits Jeremy's little sister Susy, and the childminder is taught how to manipulate brothers

programme.title: Zeke and Luther
programme.desc: The duo's parents get them horrible Christmas presents, so they make use of their jobs at the mall to sneak a pair of all-terrain skateboards on to Kirby's list. Meanwhile, Ginger sells the season's most sought-after toys, and employs an unexpected guest as her star gift-wrapper

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: Adam, Bree and Chase learn about money by doing chores for cash, and getting an allowance. They become obsessed with making as much money as possible

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.desc: When Chase only gets an A minus he is determined to become Student of the Semester. He installs attendance and healthy eating monitors, which don't improve his popularity

programme.title: Star Wars: Droid Tales
programme.desc: C-3PO and R2-D2 are imprisoned in the Geonosis Battledroid factory. In an attempt to escape, C-3PO tries to distract storm troopers by telling them about their adventures in Return of the Jedi

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Phineas and the gang host a worldwide concert to celebrate summer when Doof's latest `inator' moves the Earth, putting the season itself in jeopardy. When Major Monogram is fired from OWCA, the evil organisation LOVEMUFFIN captures the animal agents. While Perry assembles a team to take out the villains, Phineas and Ferb attempt to avert the permanent end of summer

programme.title: Walk the Prank
programme.desc: The boys become obsessed with a virtual reality game called Dino Hunt, but Bailey thinks the game is ruining everyone's life

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: Bubble Boys/Isabella and the Temple of Sap.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys create a giant bubble and float around it. Then, Isabella and the Fireside Girls help in the hunt for a Maracanut tree and the Temple of Sap

programme.title: Mech-X4
programme.sub-title: Let's Call It Mech-X4 - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Ryan and the team set out to prove to Bay City they are heroes, only to find themselves targeted by a terrifying new monster

programme.title: Lab Rats Elite Force

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Community on Solid Ground is a youth centre in Whalley Range. Before its current management took over the building the area didn't offer much for the youngsters living there and anti-social behaviour was very common. That has dropped by 73 per cent since Community on Solid Ground came along, the kids can hang out, play sports and have a place to go that means they aren't hanging around the streets. Sadly the facilities are very tired and they don't have areas they can play their beloved sport on, so the Dengineers are going to transform their outside space into a sports arena worthy of the Olympics. Dr Xand heads to a DNA laboratory to solve the mystery of who stole his strawberry milk, and there's a chance to play along at home with another mind-bending trick. Meanwhile, the 'Ouch Mobile' is open for business, and over in Accident & Emergency one patient has cut their eyebrow, and another has stapled his own finger

programme.title: Brain Freeze
programme.desc: Puppet hosts Professor Mike McCork and Dr Sorcha Knowles answer the question `can carrots turn me orange?' and find out exactly what makes up this unique vegetable. Meanwhile, it's harvest party time and Colin has made a special jam for the new boss Ms Hucklebuck, who is feeling under the weather

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Community on Solid Ground is a youth centre in Whalley Range. Before its current management took over the building the area didn't offer much for the youngsters living there and anti-social behaviour was very common. That has dropped by 73 per cent since Community on Solid Ground came along, the kids can hang out, play sports and have a place to go that means they aren't hanging around the streets. Sadly the facilities are very tired and they don't have areas they can play their beloved sport on, so the Dengineers are going to transform their outside space into a sports arena worthy of the Olympics. Presented by Mark Wright and Lauren Layfield

programme.title: Millie Inbetween
programme.desc: Lauren is completely loved-up and ignoring Millie. Missing her sister's attention, Millie pretends she's had a valentine from her new boyfriend. However, now Millie has to keep up the pretence, which turns out not to be as easy as she thought. Eventually she's cornered, and forced to invite the made-up `Grant' round to tea the next day. Naturally, the entire family wants to meet this wonderful-sounding boy. Craig impresses Fran when he sticks up for Jake - and soon she's got hearts in her eyes too, to Millie and Lauren's horror. Do they need to stage an intervention - or will Craig put her off without their help?
